sentences.sContent: We still lack a pair of chopsticks.
sentences.sContent_eng: We still lack a pair of chopsticks.

sentences.sContent: Before lunch he learned the foreigner how to use chopsticks.
sentences.sContent_eng: Before lunch he learned the foreigner how to use chopsticks.
sentences.sCn: 午饭前他教那个外国人怎样使筷子。

sentences.sContent: If you want your friend to try something they should pick it up from your plate with their own chopsticks.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you want your friend to try something they should pick it up from your plate with their own chopsticks.
sentences.sCn: 如果你想让你的朋友尝尝某道菜时，应该让他们用他们自己的筷子从你的盘中夹。

remMethod.val: chop(砍) +sticks(棍) →砍成两半的棍子→筷子
